respondent_name: Nam ar memsen Rag. Tohn Poehrner

questions.question: Do you support the signing of an executive order by President Clinton?
Do you support action by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration requiring all workplaces in the U.S. to be smoke-free?
Do you support the Environmental Protection Agency's continued research into the hazards of environmental tobacco smoke, also known as secondhand smoke?

note: Please answer questions by circling the appropriate response. If supplemental explanatory information is provided in the comments section at the end of the survey, it will not be considered unless the question to which a comment refers has been answered. Providing comments but not answering a question will be deemed as not replying to that question. Answering 'Undecided' please explain fully in the comments section or the question will be considered unanswered. Thank you very much for your cooperation.
